page.title: 18The Bletchley/Aylesbury Road
page.content: The Grand Union canal and the main Bletchley/Leighton Buzzard/Aylesbury road go through the west of our area. The canal used to be busy but is now only used by holiday boats in the summer. I did a road survey for three quarters of an hour during the afternoon. In 3/4 hour I saw 103 cars going to Leighton Buzzard and 131 going to Bletchley, 2 buses and 1 coach went to Leighton Buzzard. 1 bus went to Bletchley. There were 20 vans going to Leighton Buzzard and 21 going to Bletchley. There were 21 lorries going to Bletchley and 22 to Leighton Buzzard. We saw no bikes going to Leighton Buzzard, but 1 going towards Bletchley. Also there was 1 transporter and 2 tractors,1 ambulance and 2 land rovers. Altogether most traffic went to Bletchley at this time of day.
